StoryText: My father made me an appointment to get my car inspected but my acquaintance %FirstName:Npc:2% is having a pool party.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Go to the appointment, skip the pool party
Call and cancel the appointment and go to the pool party
Push the appointment to tomorrow and go to the pool party
Don’t call, just go to the pool party

OptionResult.Result: My father is proud of me and buys me a jacket but %FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids get annoyed at me for not showing.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids at the pool party got mad at me for not showing, but I feel good knowing my father is proud of me, and this jacket is a nice reward!

OptionResult.Result: My dad gets upset with me but doesn’t really talk much to me when I get home, though I have fun at the pool party.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I had a great time with %FirstName:Npc:2% and everyone else but coming home and seeing my father so quiet and annoyed really made me feel awful.

OptionResult.Result: My father’s proud of me for being responsible, %FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids become closer to me but I get into an accident on the way to my rescheduled appointment.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Everyone was happy with me, my father, all the kids at the pool party, but the accident I got in the next morning ruined my mood... and my car...

OptionResult.Result: My father gets mad at me and grounds me when I return but I have a blast at the pool party!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Sometimes the price you have to pay for being popular is to have your father be annoyed with you and ground you. Hopefully not permanently or anything...
